Text:
wow I was just thinking about this game. I LOVED Vietcong (1) and when I played this game it was so wonky and unstable. 

Does it work with Windows 7 ?
I do not know it. At me Windows XP. Download, and then tell it works on Windows 7 or not

I have installed it sucessfully, but when i try to play it says:"Wrong disc inserted. Please insert the CD/DVD".
Whats wrong? Should i burn the CD with a special program? Please help me, i want this game!
how do i play online with this game ?
The crack is in the Vietcong 2 folder ... just download it and copy the crack in the directory of the game ... and yes you can play in multiplayer.
